text: Jjoannagopenadmin:~$ sudo -1 Matching Defaults entries for joanna on openadmin: env_reset, mail_badpass, secure_path=/ust/local/sbin\:/usr/local/bin\:/usr/sbin\:/usr/bin\:/sbin\: /bin\:/snap/bin User joanna may run the following commands on openadmin: (ALL) NOPASSWD: /bin/nano /opt/priv Jjoannanopenadmin:~$ sudo /bin/nano /opt/priv
